sqlMap.select: SELECT ID, FILE_NAME, PARENT_ID, DEFAULT_YN, ICONCLS FROM SPRING_FINDER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #memberId# AND PARENT_ID = #parentId# AND FILE_TYPE = 'F'

SELECT (select parent_id from spring_finder where id = #parentId#) as ID, '..' as FILE_NAME, #parentId# as PARENT_ID, 'Y' as DEFAULT_YN, 'folder' as ICONCLS , 'up-folder' as IMGNAME, 'springfinder' as LINK_APP_ID, '' as FILE_ADDITION_INFO , 'F' as FILE_TYPE FROM dual union all
SELECT ID, FILE_NAME, PARENT_ID, DEFAULT_YN, ICONCLS, ICONCLS||'-'||LINK_APP_ID as IMGNAME, LINK_APP_ID, FILE_ADDITION_INFO , FILE_TYPE FROM SPRING_FINDER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #memberId# AND PARENT_ID = #parentId# ORDER BY PARENT_ID, FILE_TYPE ,ID
SELECT id FROM SPRING_FINDER sf WHERE SF.MEMBER_ID = #memberId# AND SF.DEFAULT_YN = 'Y' AND link_app_id = #link_app_id#
